title.narrative: DECP 2018-2022 Latin America

description.narrative: Board and staff of Latin American employers' organisations or federations

DECP aims to assist employers organisations in some Latin American countries (in a Crosscutting setting) in exchanging lobbying and social dialogue experiences with the aim to thus contribute to a better business climate in these countries and with the ultimate objective of creating jobs and alleviating poverty.
EOs in Latin American countries make a start with building or improving their lobbying

mailing-address.narrative: P.O. Box 93002, 2509 AA The Hague, NL
